segments.text: How are your Chinese lessons going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh I ’ m learning very slowly . I think Chinese is more difficult than English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well I guess you have fewer characters but I think Chinese grammar is easier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe , but I think people usually learn English more quickly than Chinese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I guess basic speaking in the English is easier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe that ’ s why your English is much better than my Chinese .
segments.speaker: S2
